post.text: I believe in making the best deals for America. NAFTA was a horrible deal! I want to make great deals that will keep jobs here and employ millions of Americans. We MUST get America back to work! #MakeAmericaWorkAgain

comment.author: Mickala
comment.text: NAFTA was an even more horrible deal for us Canadians.

replies.author: Mickala
replies.text: Thanks, Myriem . Right back at you, our American brothers.

replies.author: Myriem
replies.text: Hope our two countries can stay allies forever!
